SEARCH
Package appointment

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
appointment.Appointment
public class Appointment extends Object
This class represents a medical appointment between a doctor and a patient. It stores details about the appointment, such as the status, the doctor and patient involved, appointment date and time, consultation notes, prescribed medications, and service type (e.g., X-ray).

The appointment status is managed using the ApptStatus enum, and the class provides methods to update and retrieve appointment details.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Appointment()
    Default constructor that initializes the appointment with a status of NOT_SCHEDULED and null values for the doctor, patient, appointment date, time, and ID.
    Appointment(Doctor doctor, Patient patient, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime, String appointmentID)
    Constructor for creating a new appointment with specific doctor, patient, date, time, and appointment ID.
    Appointment(Doctor doctor, Patient patient, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime, String appointmentID, ApptStatus status)
    Constructor for creating a new appointment with a specified status.

  • Constructor Details

    • Appointment

      public Appointment()
      Default constructor that initializes the appointment with a status of NOT_SCHEDULED and null values for the doctor, patient, appointment date, time, and ID.

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(Doctor doctor, Patient patient, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime, String appointmentID)
      Constructor for creating a new appointment with specific doctor, patient, date, time, and appointment ID. The appointment status is set to PENDING.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor assigned to the appointment.
      patient - The patient assigned to the appointment.
      appointmentDate - The date of the appointment.
      appointmentTime - The time of the appointment.
      appointmentID - The unique identifier for the appointment.

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(Doctor doctor, Patient patient, LocalDate appointmentDate, LocalTime appointmentTime, String appointmentID, ApptStatus status)
      Constructor for creating a new appointment with a specified status.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor assigned to the appointment.
      patient - The patient assigned to the appointment.
      appointmentDate - The date of the appointment.
      appointmentTime - The time of the appointment.
      appointmentID - The unique identifier for the appointment.
      status - The current status of the appointment (e.g., PENDING, CONFIRMED).

    • setDate

      public void setDate(LocalDate appointmentDate)
      Sets the date of the appointment. The date must be in the future.
      Parameters:
      appointmentDate - The date to set for the appointment.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided date is in the past.
